section.title: void CRYP_DeInit (void)
section.emphasis: Deinitializes the CRYP peripheral registers to their default reset values.

section.title: void CRYP_Init (CRYP_InitTypeDef *CRYP_InitStruct)
section.emphasis: Initializes the CRYP peripheral according to the specified parameters in the CRYP_InitStruct.

entry.para: pointer to a CRYP_InitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration information for the CRYP peripheral.

section.title: void CRYP_StructInit (CRYP_InitTypeDef *CRYP_InitStruct)
section.emphasis: Fills each CRYP_InitStruct member with its default value.

entry.para: pointer to a CRYP_InitTypeDef structure which will be initialized.

section.title: void CRYP_KeyInit (CRYP_KeyInitTypeDef *CRYP_KeyInitStruct)
section.emphasis: Initializes the CRYP Keys according to the specified parameters in the CRYP_KeyInitStruct.

entry.para: pointer to a CRYP_KeyInitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration information for the CRYP Keys.

section.title: void CRYP_KeyStructInit (CRYP_KeyInitTypeDef *CRYP_KeyInitStruct)
section.emphasis: Fills each CRYP_KeyInitStruct member with its default value.

entry.para: pointer to a CRYP_KeyInitTypeDef structure which will be initialized.

section.title: void CRYP_IVInit (CRYP_IVInitTypeDef *CRYP_IVInitStruct)
section.emphasis: Initializes the CRYP Initialization Vectors(IV) according to the specified parameters in the CRYP_IVInitStruct.

entry.para: pointer to a CRYP_IVInitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration information for the CRYP Initialization Vectors(IV).

section.title: void CRYP_IVStructInit (CRYP_IVInitTypeDef *CRYP_IVInitStruct)
section.emphasis: Fills each CRYP_IVInitStruct member with its default value.

entry.para: pointer to a CRYP_IVInitTypeDef Initialization Vectors(IV) structure which will be initialized.

section.title: void CRYP_Cmd (FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the CRYP peripheral.

entry.para: new state of the CRYP peripheral. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void CRYP_DataIn (uint32_t Data)
section.emphasis: Writes data in the Data Input register (DIN).

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: After the DIN register has been read once or several times, the FIFO must be flushed (using CRYP_FIFOFlush() function).

entry.para: data to write in Data Input register

section.title: uint32_t CRYP_DataOut (void)
section.emphasis: Returns the last data entered into the output FIFO.

entry.para: data entered into the output FIFO.

section.title: void CRYP_FIFOFlush (void)
section.emphasis: Flushes the IN and OUT FIFOs (that is read and write pointers of the FIFOs are reset)

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: The FIFOs must be flushed only when BUSY flag is reset.

section.title: ErrorStatus CRYP_SaveContext (CRYP_Context *CRYP_ContextSave, CRYP_KeyInitTypeDef *CRYP_KeyInitStruct)
section.emphasis: Saves the CRYP peripheral Context.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: This function stops DMA transfer before to save the context. After restoring the context, you have to enable the DMA again (if the DMA was previously used).

entry.para: pointer to a CRYP_Context structure that contains the repository for current context.
pointer to a CRYP_KeyInitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration information for the CRYP Keys.

section.title: void CRYP_RestoreContext (CRYP_Context *CRYP_ContextRestore)
section.emphasis: Restores the CRYP peripheral Context.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: Since teh DMA transfer is stopped in CRYP_SaveContext() function, after restoring the context, you have to enable the DMA again (if the DMA was previously used).

entry.para: pointer to a CRYP_Context structure that contains the repository for saved context.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: The data that were saved during context saving must be rewrited into the IN FIFO.

section.title: void CRYP_DMACmd (uint8_t CRYP_DMAReq, FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the CRYP DMA interface.

entry.para:
specifies the CRYP DMA transfer request to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
CRYP_DMAReq_DataOUT: DMA for outgoing(Tx) data transfer
CRYP_DMAReq_DataIN: DMA for incoming(Rx) data transfer
new state of the selected CRYP DMA transfer request. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void CRYP_ITConfig (uint8_t CRYP_IT, FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the specified CRYP interrupts.

entry.para:
specifies the CRYP interrupt source to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
CRYP_IT_INI: Input FIFO interrupt
CRYP_IT_OUTI: Output FIFO interrupt
new state of the specified CRYP interrupt. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: ITStatus CRYP_GetITStatus (uint8_t CRYP_IT)
section.emphasis: Checks whether the specified CRYP interrupt has occurred or not.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: This function checks the status of the masked interrupt (i.e the interrupt should be previously enabled).

entry.para:
specifies the CRYP (masked) interrupt source to check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
CRYP_IT_INI: Input FIFO interrupt
CRYP_IT_OUTI: Output FIFO interrupt
new state of CRYP_IT (SET or RESET).

section.title: FlagStatus CRYP_GetFlagStatus (uint8_t CRYP_FLAG)
section.emphasis: Checks whether the specified CRYP flag is set or not.

entry.para:
specifies the CRYP flag to check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
CRYP_FLAG_IFEM: Input FIFO Empty flag.
CRYP_FLAG_IFNF: Input FIFO Not Full flag.
CRYP_FLAG_OFNE: Output FIFO Not Empty flag.
CRYP_FLAG_OFFU: Output FIFO Full flag.
CRYP_FLAG_BUSY: Busy flag.
CRYP_FLAG_OUTRIS: Output FIFO raw interrupt flag.
CRYP_FLAG_INRIS: Input FIFO raw interrupt flag.
new state of CRYP_FLAG (SET or RESET).

section.title: ErrorStatus CRYP_AES_ECB (uint8_t Mode, uint8_t *Key, uint16_t Keysize, uint8_t *Input, uint32_t Ilength, uint8_t *Output)
section.emphasis: Encrypt and decrypt using AES in ECB Mode.

entry.para:
encryption or decryption Mode. This parameter can be one of the following values:
MODE_ENCRYPT: Encryption
MODE_DECRYPT: Decryption
Key used for AES algorithm.
length of the Key, must be a 128, 192 or 256.
pointer to the Input buffer.
length of the Input buffer, must be a multiple of 16.
pointer to the returned buffer.

ErrorStatus enumeration value:
SUCCESS: Operation done
ERROR: Operation failed

section.title: ErrorStatus CRYP_AES_CBC (uint8_t Mode, uint8_t InitVectors[16], uint8_t *Key, uint16_t Keysize, uint8_t *Input, uint32_t Ilength, uint8_t *Output)
section.emphasis: Encrypt and decrypt using AES in CBC Mode.

entry.para:
encryption or decryption Mode. This parameter can be one of the following values:
MODE_ENCRYPT: Encryption
MODE_DECRYPT: Decryption
Initialisation Vectors used for AES algorithm.
Key used for AES algorithm.
length of the Key, must be a 128, 192 or 256.
pointer to the Input buffer.
length of the Input buffer, must be a multiple of 16.
pointer to the returned buffer.

ErrorStatus enumeration value:
SUCCESS: Operation done
ERROR: Operation failed
